modName: Removed Sound for Level Up and Skill Increase
summary: Removes the sounds played upon a Level Up or a Skill Increase.
descriptionHtml:
This small mod is nothing special, it simply removes the sounds played when you (or your character, whatever) level up or increase a skill.
You can use the mod as you see fit, however for the most immersive experience I use it with the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35154/?]Less Intrusive HUD II[/url] by Crashnburn (I downscale the skill text and level up meter to 0%).

Requirements: None that I know of.
Conflicts:Â None that I know of.


If you run into a problem let me know and I will try to fix it. No promisses though, as this is my first mod...
author: Liniar
